meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of Priapus, the ancient Greek god of fertility.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with priapean statues of the god of fertility.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a priapean painting depicting the ancient Greek god.
meanings.sent3: The priapean decorations at the festival added a touch of ancient charm.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a priapean quality, infectious and full of life.
meanings.sent5: The priapean music filled the room, invoking feelings of abundance and joy.

meanings.definition: A poem or work of art that celebrates fertility or male sexuality.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a collection of priapeans from different cultures.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a priapean inspired by the beauty of nature and life.
meanings.sent3: The priapean at the exhibit sparked interesting conversations among visitors.
meanings.sent4: His poem was a priapean, celebrating the strength and vitality of man.
meanings.sent5: The priapean sculpture captured the essence of masculinity and abundance.
